project.title: Traffic Flow Optimizer
project.desc: Iâ€™m building a real-time traffic monitoring and optimization system with YOLOv8 detection, DeepSORT tracking, and graph-based LP optimization.

project.title: Wiedemann Analyzer
project.desc: (ASYM Lab Research) I built a linear system C++ solver (LinBox) & Python analyzer to analyze multiple Monte Carlo algorithms for solving large, sparse linear systems efficiently.

project.title: The Triangle
project.desc: (IT Team) We automated data migration from WordPress to MariaDB by automating ETL (+ fixing inconsistent data) and conversion into MySQL commands.

project.title: Pill Reminder
project.desc: (DragonHacks project) We worked on a medication system comprised of a Flutter UI, a Flask + Render backend, a MongoDB database, and a Arduino-driven pill dispenser.

project.title: Drexel Diet App
project.desc: (Course project for CI-10X) We made a cross-platform Flutter app that helps Drexel students plan meals and meet dietary goals using live data from campus dining halls.

project.title: Trash-Collecting Robot
project.desc: A trash-collecting robot I developed in my internship at Fulbright University Vietnam. I worked on navigation, image processing (object detection), and low-level electrical.

project.title: Virtual Monkey FSM
project.desc: A finite-state machine based interactive virtual pet simulator. End-of-course project for Intro to Computer Science, originally programmed and compiled in Tranquility (course's language).

project.title: Euphoniter - Music blog
project.desc: A responsive music blog platform for sharing music-related content. It's one of my passion project during early high school, and is also my first exposure to web development.

project.title: Mr. Discipline Discord Bot
project.desc: A Discord bot that supports studying tasking, time tracking, music playback, and staying focused. Another passion project for me and my friends.
